H0.text: In which city in the UK is the National Railways Museum. London

H1.text: In which city in the UK is the National Railways Museum. Manchester

H2.text: In which city in the UK is the National Railways Museum. Birmingham

H3.text: In which city in the UK is the National Railways Museum. YORK

A4.text: The National Railway Museum (NRM) is a museum in York, England, forming part of the Science Museum Group.

A5.text: The National Railway Museum was established on its present site, the former York North locomotive depot, in 1975.
